title: Panorama: the state wide screen [excerpts No. 1]
creator_credit: Australian Broadcasting Commission and David Witt
brief_description: Excerpts from the Panorama documentary on the State Film Centre of Victoria. Candid footage of the goings on at the S.F.C.V. in Carlton in the early sixties. Customer service, despatch operations, film retrieving, checking and cleaning, and free film screenings in urban and rural areas.
